xwikidoc.content:
The **taskgantt** macro draws an interactive Gantt diagram which shows tasks, optionally filtered by start/end date, assignee or project.
=== Examples ===
(% class="box" %) ((( ~{~{taskgantt readonly="false"/}} - enable editing through the UI (disabled by default)
~{~{taskgantt from="2024-08-01T08:00:00.000"/}} - filter by start date
~{~{taskgantt from="2024-08-01T08:00:00.000" to="2024-08-31T17:00:00.000"/}} - filter by start and end dates
~{~{taskgantt projects="Alpha,Beta,Gamma"/}} - filter by projects (comma separated, escape commas in project names with '\,')
~{~{taskgantt assignees="XWiki.Admin,XWiki.User1"/}} - filter by assigned users (comma separated) )))
{{taskgantt/}}
